desc: I enrolled in the digital marketing course during my college break, and it was the best decision! It was interactive, easy to follow, and packed with real-world examples. The certification helped me stand out in my job interviews.
The tools covered like Power BI, Tableau, and Python were exactly what the industry needs. Mentors were supportive and gave individual attention whenever I was stuck.

After completing this course, I was able to land freelance projects from clients in India and abroad. The curriculum covered everything — SEO, email marketing, WordPress, analytics — and the support from the mentors was amazing.
